hypothesis: RMSE emphasizes large errors. MAE might be more robust to outliers and lead to better overall fit.
key_finding: ABORTED based on prior evidence. EXP_LOG_RMSE_LOSS_001 and EXP_WEIGHTED_SENSOR_LOSS_001 both FAILED when changing the loss function. MAE minimizer != RMSE minimizer. Optimizing MAE while being scored on RMSE finds wrong solution.
